place.name: WHITESTAUNTON
place.gazetteerText: STAUNTON (White), a parish in Chard district, Somerset; 3 miles WNW of Chard r. station. Post town, Chard. Acres, 1,960. Real property, £1,853. Pop., 250. Houses, 46. The living is a rectory in the diocese of Bath and Wells. Value, £255.* Patron, J. Elton, Esq. The church is later English. (In 1870-72, John Marius Wilson's Imperial Gazetteer of England and Wales)
